chunk.title: Why is it hard to use your smartphone?

menu.item: Things on the screen are too small
Reading the words on the screen is hard

chunk.title: What would make the words easier to read?

menu.item: Change the colour of the words so they are easier to see
Make the phone read the words aloud

recipe.item: Choose an option that mentions "font size"

chunk.title: Make the phone read the words aloud

menu.item: Talk to your smartphone to tell it to open the Settings

chunk.title: Find the Settings in your apps

recipe.item: Choose "search apps" near the top of the screen
When you see the Settings app, choose it

chunk.title: Swipe up from the bottom of the screen

recipe.item: Hold your finger above the middle of the screen, at the bottom, without touching it
Start moving your finger towards the top of the screen
Keeping your finger moving, put it down on the screen
Lift your finger off the screen
